officialTitle: Economic Evaluation of ART Sealant in Preventing Pit and Fissure Caries in Permanent First Molars in an Asia Population
inclusionCriteria:
* generally healthy grade 1-2 school children
* with written parental consent
* with at least 1 sound and fully erupted permanent first molar
* Must have minimum age of 7 Years
* Must have maximum age of 10 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Can not cooperate with the treatment
* Can not obtain the child's parental consent
